Posts.Content: Oct 9, 2012 05:51PM ginger1951 wrote: I have lump in my right breast.  I have been scared to even tell my family let alone my doctor.  I am teach special education and when I bought my staff the T-shirts for Breast Cancer Month, I decide it was time to get the mammogram.  I go Thurs. morning and I know the pressure will send me through the ceiling.  I just am so scared of what the test will show.
Posts.Title: Scared, trying not to worry mar994 pupmom

Posts.Content: Oct 15, 2012 04:47PM ginger1951 wrote: Today Oct. 15.  I was diagnosed with breast cancer. My doctor recommended a mastecy.  My surgery is set for Oct. 29. I just have to wait again.
Posts.Title: Scared, trying not to worry mar994 pupmom

Posts.Content: Oct 11, 2012 07:19PM ginger1951 wrote: Today I had my mammogram, then ultrasound.  Talked with the radiologist and he is talking to my doctor.   Well, I called my doctor and told them, as soon as possible.  The the surgeon call and he could see me for a consultation on Friday.  When he was told that I was scared, he call and said if I could be there within the hour, so I went.  He examined me and now the biosye is scheduled for Friday at 12:30 and he said he would put a rush on it   I jsut have to make it through the weekend. Thank you all for the support and prayers. Tabatha,  Go to the dogpile search engine and put in Bi-Rad4 and you will get a lot of information.
Posts.Title: Scared, trying not to worry mar994 pupmom
